Text:
Hangar,

I don't have FSQuality's Japan, but if you use all the airports from Simmer's Sky together with this freeware Japan mesh on AVSIM:

japan1_srtm_mesh.zip
japan2_srtm_mesh.zip

you should get amazing results :)

now I thought you mentioned something about the Captain Sim 757 for FSX..they are all already out there, except for the freighters..I have the FS2004 installer with loader, and a loader for the FSX version..do you have the installer itself?
Hi 4X-AXG, thanks for this up. Is it an installer pls?
click on the '3' where it says 'Files:' ;-)
Yeah, apologies 4x, senior moment (get a lot of those lately!). Thanks again.
4x, yes i have the 767-300 installer for fs9, but no loader.
do you mean the 757-300? they are already out there..only model missing is the 757 freighter for FSX..if you have that one, you're a hero
Anybody seed Simmer's Sky-Japanese Airports vol.7 and vol.8 for FS2004 please!!!

Thanks man.
Working fine.
And also good for FSX.
